meanings.definition: A person who is good or kind.
meanings.sent1: She is known in the neighborhood as a bonnier for always helping others.
meanings.sent2: The bonnier at the shelter spends his weekends volunteering with animals.
meanings.sent3: The little girl thought of herself as a bonnier when she shared her toys with her friends.
meanings.sent4: He was a true bonnier, always ready to lend a hand to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The bonnier in the story was rewarded for his kindness with a magical gift.
